analyzed: jagat janma ādikāraṇam brahma vedānta vedyam iti uktam
tat ayuktam
tat hi na vākya pratipādyam
anumānena siddheḥ iti āśaṅkya āha
śāstra yoni tvāt
śastram yasya yoniḥ kāraṇam
pramāṇam
tat śāstra yoniḥ
tasya bhāvaḥ śāstra yoni tvam tasmāt
brahma jñāna kāraṇa tvāt śāstrasya tad yoni tvam brahmaṇaḥ

original: atyantātīndriyatvena pratyakṣādipramāṇāviṣayatayā brahmaṇaś śāstraikapramāṇakatvād uktasvarūpaṃ brahma yato vā imāni bhūtānītyādivākyaṃ bodhayaty  #
analyzed: atyanta atīndriya tvena pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa aviṣaya tayā brahmaṇaḥ śāstra eka pramāṇaka tvāt ukta svarūpam brahma yatas vai imāni bhūtāni ityādi vākyam bodhayati  /
eva iti arthaḥ
nanu śāstra yoni tvam brahmaṇaḥ na saṃbhavati
pramāṇa antara vedya tvāt
aprāpte tu śāstram arthavat
kim tarhi tatra pramāṇam
na tāvat pratyakṣam

original: tad dhi dvividham indriyasaṃbhavaṃ yogasaṃbhavaṃ ceti /
analyzed: tat hi dvividham indriya saṃbhavam yoga saṃbhavam ca iti

original: indriyasaṃbhavaṃ ca bāhyasaṃbhavam āntarasaṃbhavaṃ ceti dvividhā /
analyzed: indriya saṃbhavam ca bāhya saṃbhavam āntara saṃbhavam ca iti dvividhā
bāhya indriyāṇi vidyamāna sannikarṣa yogya sva viṣaya bodha jananāni iti na sarva artha sākṣātkāra tad nirmāṇa samartha puruṣa viśeṣa viṣaya bodha jananāni
na api āntaram
āntara sukha duḥkha ādi vyatirikta bahis viṣayeṣu tasya bāhya indriya anapekṣa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ
na api yoga janyam

original: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tasya viśadāvabhāsatve 'pi pūrvānubhūtaviṣayasmṛtimātratvān na prāmāṇyam iti kutaḥ pratyakṣatā ?
analyzed: bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta janmanaḥ tasya viśada avabhāsa tve pi pūrva anubhūta viṣaya smṛti mātra tvāt na prāmāṇyam iti kutas pratyakṣa tā
tad atirikta viṣaya tve kāraṇa abhāvāt
tathā sati tasya bhrama rūpavatā
na api anumānam viśeṣatodṛṣṭam
sāmānyatodṛṣṭam vā
atīndriye vastuni saṃbandha avadhāraṇa virahāt na viśeṣatodṛṣṭam
samasta vastu sākṣātkāra tad nirmāṇa samartha puruṣa viśeṣa niyatam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam api na liṅgam upalabhayte
nanu ca jagataḥ kāryatvam tad upādāna upakaraṇa saṃpradāna prayojana abhijña kartṛkatva vyāptam
acetana ārabdham jagataḥ ca eka cetanā adhīna tvena vyāptam
sarvam hi ghaṭa ādi kāryam tad upādāna upakaraṇa saṃpradāna prayojana abhijña kartṛkam dṛṣṭam
acetana ārabdham arogam sva śarīram eka cetanā adhīnam ca
sa avayava tvena jagataḥ kārya tvam
ucyate kim idam eka cetanā adhīnatvam
na tāvat tad āyatta utpatti sthiti tvam
dṛṣṭāntaḥ hi sādhya vikalaḥ syāt
na hi arogam sva śarīram eka cetanā āyatta utpatti sthiti
tad śarīrasya bhoktṝṇām bhāryā ādi sarva cenatānām adṛṣṭa janya tvāt tad utpatti sthityoḥ

original: kiṃ ca, śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavetatārūpā sthitir avayavasaṃśleṣavyatirekeṇa na cetanam apekṣate /
analyzed: kim ca śarīra avayavinaḥ sva avayava samaveta tā rūpā sthitiḥ avayava saṃśleṣa vyatirekeṇa na cetanam apekṣate

original: prāṇanalakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ pakṣatvābhimate kṣitijaladhimahīdharādau na saṃbhavatīti pakṣasapakṣānugatām ekarūpāṃ sthitiṃ nopalabhāmahe /
analyzed: prāṇana lakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ pakṣa tva abhimate kṣiti jaladhi mahīdhara ādau na saṃbhavati iti pakṣa sapakṣa anugatām eka rūpām sthitim na upalabhāmahe
tat āyatta pravṛtti tvam tad adhīna tvam iti ced
aneka cetana sādhyeṣu gurutara ratha śilā mahīruha ādiṣu vyabhicāraḥ
cetana mātra adhīna tve siddha sādhya tā

original: kiṃ ca, ubhayavādisiddhānāṃ jīvānām eva lāghavena kartṛtvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca ubhaya vādi siddhānām jīvānām eva lāghavena kartṛ tva abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ
na ca jīvānām upādāna ādi anabhijña tayā kartṛ tva asaṃbhavaḥ
sarveṣām eva cetanānām pṛthivī ādi upādāna yāga ādi upakaraṇa sākṣātkāra sāmarthyāt

original: yathedānīṃ pṛthivyādayo yāgādayaś ca pratyakṣam īkṣyante /
analyzed: yathā idānīm pṛthivī ādayaḥ yāga ādayaḥ ca pratyakṣam īkṣyante
upakaraṇa bhūta yāga ādi śakti rūpa apūrva ādi śabda vācya adṛṣṭa sākṣātkāra abhāve pi cetanānām na kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ
tad sākṣātkāra an apekṣaṇāt kārya ārambhasya
bhaktimat sākṣātkāraḥ eva hi kārya ārambha upayogī
śakteḥ tu jñāna mātram eva upayujyate
na sākṣātkāraḥ

original: na hi kulālādayaḥ kāryopakaraṇabhūtadaṇḍacakrādivat tacchaktim api sākṣātkṛtya ghaṭamaṇikādikāryam ārabhante /
analyzed: na hi kulāla ādayaḥ kārya upakaraṇa bhūta daṇḍa cakra ādi vat tad śaktim api sākṣātkṛtya ghaṭa maṇika ādi kāryam ārabhante
iha tu cetanānām āgama avagata yāga ādi śakti viśeṣāṇām
kārya ārambhaḥ na anupapannaḥ

original: kiṃ ca, yacchakyakriyaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ca tad eva tadabhijñakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: kim ca yat śakya kriyam śakya upādāna ādi vijñānam ca tat eva tad abhijña kartṛkam dṛṣṭam

original: mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādi tv aśakyakriyam aśakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ceti na cetanakartṛkam /
analyzed: mahī mahīdhara mahā arṇava ādi tu aśakya kriyam aśakya upādāna ādi vijñānam ca iti na cetana kartṛkam

original: ato ghaṭamaṇikādi sajātīyaśakyakriyaśakyopādānādivijñānavastugatam eva kāryatvaṃ buddhimankartṛpūrvakatvasādhane prabhavati /
analyzed: atas ghaṭa maṇika ādi sajātīya śakya kriya śakya upādāna ādi vijñāna vastu gatam eva kāryatvam buddhiman kartṛ pūrvakatva sādhane prabhavati

original: kiṃ ca, ghaṭādikāryam anīśvareṇālpajñānaśaktinā saśarīreṇa parigrahavatānāptakāmena
analyzed: kim ca ghaṭa ādi kāryam anīśvareṇa alpa jñāna śaktinā sa śarīreṇa parigrahavatā anāpta kāmena

original: nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathāvidham eva cetanaṃ kartāraṃ sādhayann ayaṃ kāryatvahetus
analyzed: nirmitam dṛṣṭam iti tathāvidham eva cetanam kartāram sādhayan ayam kārya tva hetuḥ
siṣādhayiṣita puruṣa sārvajñya sarva aiśvarya ādi viparīta sādhanāt viruddhaḥ syāt
na ca etāvatā sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ

original: liṅgini pramāṇāntaragocare liṅgabalopasthāpitā viparītaviśeṣās tatpramāṇapratihatagatayo nivartante /
analyzed: liṅgini pramāṇa antara gocare liṅga bala upasthāpitāḥ viparīta viśeṣāḥ tad pramāṇa pratihata gatayaḥ nivartante

original: iha tu sakaletarapramāṇāviṣaye liṅgini nikhilanirmāṇacature anvayavyatirekāvagatāvinābhāvaniyamā dharmās sarva evāviśeṣeṇa prasajyante;
analyzed: iha tu sakala itara pramāṇa aviṣaye liṅgini nikhila nirmāṇa cature anvaya vyatireka avagata avinābhāva niyamāḥ dharmāḥ sarve eva aviśeṣeṇa prasajyante
nivartaka pramāṇa abhāvāt tathā eva avatiṣṭhante

original: ata āgamād ṛte katham īśvaras setsyati ?
analyzed: atas āgamāt ṛte katham īśvaraḥ setsyati

original: atrāhuḥ / sāvayavatvād eva jagataḥ kāryatvaṃ na pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: atra āhuḥ sāvayava tvāt eva jagataḥ kārya tvam na pratyākhyātum śakyate

original: bhavanti ca prayogāḥ vivādādhyāsitaṃ bhūbhūdharādi kāryam,
analyzed: bhavanti ca prayogāḥ vivāda adhyāsitam bhū bhūdhara ādi kāryam
sa avayava tvāt
ghaṭa ādi vat
tathā vivāda adhyāsitam avani jaladhi mahīdhara ādi kāryam
mahattve sati kriyāvat tvāt ghaṭa vat
tanu bhuvana ādi kāryam
mahat tve sati mūrta tvāt
ghaṭa vat iti

original: sāvayaveṣu dravyeṣu idam eva kriyate netarad iti kāryatvasya niyāmakaṃ sāvayavatvātireki rūpāntaraṃ nopalabhāmahe /
analyzed: sa avayaveṣu dravyeṣu idam eva kriyate na itarat iti kārya tvasya niyāmakam sāvayava tva atireki rūpa antaram na upalabhāmahe

original: kāryatvapratiniyataṃ śakyakriyatvaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānatvaṃ copalabhyata iti cen na;
analyzed: kārya tva pratiniyatam śakya kriya tvam śakya upādāna ādi vijñāna tvam ca upalabhyate iti ced na

original: kāryatvenānumate 'pi viṣaye jñānaśaktī kāryānumeye ity anyatrāpi sāvayavatvādinā kāryatvaṃ jñātam iti te ca pratipanne eveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ
analyzed: kārya tvena anumate viṣaye jñāna śaktī kārya anumeye iti anyatra api sāvayava tva ādinā kārya tvam jñātam iti te ca pratipanne eva iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ
tathā hi ghaṭa maṇika ādiṣu kṛteṣu kārya darśana anumita kartṛ gata tad nirmāṇa śakti jñānaḥ puruṣaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvam

original: vicitrasanniveśaṃ narendrabhavanam ālokya avayavasanniveṣaviśeṣeṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ niścitya tadānīm eva kartus tajjñānaśaktivaicitryam anuminoti
analyzed: vicitra sanniveśam narendra bhavanam ālokya avayava sanniveṣa viśeṣeṇa tasya kārya tvam niścitya tadānīm eva kartuḥ tad jñānaśakti vaicitryam anuminoti

original: atas tanubhuvanādeḥ kāryatve siddhe sarvasākṣātkāratannirmāṇādinipuṇaḥ kvacit puruṣaviśeṣas sidhyaty eva /
analyzed: atas tanu bhuvana ādeḥ kārya tve siddhe sarva sākṣātkāra tad nirmāṇa ādi nipuṇaḥ kvacid puruṣa viśeṣaḥ sidhyati eva

original: kiṃ ca sarvacetanānāṃ dharmādharmanimitte 'pi sukhaduḥkhopabhoge cetanānadhiṣṭhitayos
analyzed: kim ca sarva cetanānām dharma adharma nimitte sukha duḥkha upabhoge cetanā anadhiṣṭhitayoḥ

original: tayor acetanayoḥ phalahetutvānupapattes sarvakarmānuguṇasarvaphalapradānacaturaḥ kaścid āstheyaḥ;
analyzed: tayoḥ acetanayoḥ phala hetu tva anupapatteḥ sarva karma anuguṇa sarva phala pradāna caturaḥ kaścid āstheyaḥ
vardhakinā anadhiṣṭhitasya vā asya ādeḥ acetanasya deśa kāla ādi aneka parikara sannidhāne pi yūpa ādi nirmāṇa sādhanatva adarśanāt

original: bījāṅkuarādeḥ pakṣāntarbhāvena tair vyabhicārāpādanaṃ śrotriyavetālānām anabhijñatāvijṛmbhitam /
analyzed: bīja aṅkuara ādeḥ pakṣa antarbhāvena taiḥ vyabhicāra āpādanam śrotriya vetālānām anabhijña tā vijṛmbhitam

original: tata eva sukhādibhir vyabhicāravacanam api tathaiva /
analyzed: tatas eva sukha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāra vacanam api tathā eva
na ca lāghavena ubhaya vādi saṃpratipanna kṣetrajñānām eva īdṛśa adhiṣṭhātṛ tva kalpanam yuktam
teṣām sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa darśana śakti niścayāt
darśana anuguṇā eva hi sarvatra kalpanā
na ca kṣetrajña vat īśvarasya aśakti niścayaḥ sti
atas prāmāṇa antaraḥ na tad siddhi anupapattiḥ
samartha kartṛ pūrvakatva niyata kāryatva hetunā
sidhyan svābhāvika sarva sākṣātkāra tad niyamana śakti saṃpannaḥ eva sidhyati
yat tu anaiśvarya ādi āpādanena dharma viśeṣa viparīta sādhanatvam unnītam

original: sapakṣe sahadṛṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāryasyāhetubhūtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ liṅginy aprāpteḥ /
analyzed: sapakṣe sahadṛṣṭānām sarveṣām kāryasya a hetu bhūtānām ca dharmāṇām liṅgini aprāpteḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: kenacit kiṃcit kriyamāṇaṃ svotpattaye kartus svanirmāṇasāmarthyaṃ svopādānopakaraṇajñānaṃ cāpekṣate;
analyzed: kenacid kiṃcid kriyamāṇam sva utpattaye kartuḥ sva nirmāṇa sāmarthyam sva upādāna upakaraṇa jñānam ca apekṣate
na tu anya a sāmarthyam anya jñānam ca
hetu tva abhāvāt
sva nirmāṇa sāmarthya sva upādāna upakaraṇa jñānābhyām eva sva utpattau upapannāyām saṃbandhi tayā darśana mātreṇa akiṃcitkarasya artha antara ajñāna ādeḥ hetu tva kalpanā yogāt
iti
na tāvat sarva viṣayam

original: na hi kulālādiḥ kriyamāṇavyatiriktaṃ kim api na jānāti /
analyzed: na hi kulāla ādiḥ kriyamāṇa vyatiriktam kim api na jānāti
na api katipaya viṣayam

original: sarveṣu kartṛṣu tattadajñānāśaktyaniyamena sarveṣām ajñānādīnāṃ vyabhicārāt / ataḥ
analyzed: sarveṣu kartṛṣu tad tad ajñāna aśakti aniyamena sarveṣām ajñāna ādīnām vyabhicārāt atas

original: kāryatvasyāsādhakānām anīśvaratvādīnāṃ liṅginy apratītir iti na viparītasādhanatvam /
analyzed: kāryatvasya asādhakānām anīśvara tva ādīnām liṅginī apratītiḥ iti na viparīta sādhanatvam

original: kulālādīnāṃ daṇḍacakrādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīradvāreṇaiva dṛṣṭam iti jagadupādānopakaraṇādhiṣṭhānam īśvarasyāśarīrasyānupapannam iti cen na;
analyzed: kulāla ādīnām daṇḍa cakra ādi adhiṣṭhānam śarīra dvāreṇa eva dṛṣṭam iti jagat upādāna upakaraṇa adhiṣṭhānam īśvarasya aśarīrasya anupapannam iti ced na
saṃkalpa mātreṇa eva para śarīra gata bhūta vetāla garala ādi apagama vināśa darśanāt

original: katham aśarīrasya parapravartanarūpas saṃkalpa iti cet;
analyzed: katham aśarīrasya para pravartana rūpaḥ saṃkalpaḥ iti ced
na śarīra apekṣaḥ saṃkalpaḥ
śarīrasya saṃkalpa hetu tva abhāvāt
manaḥ eva hi saṃkalpa hetuḥ
tat abhyupagatam īśvare pi
kārya tvena eva jñāna śakti vat manasaḥ api prāpta tvāt
mānasaḥ saṃkalpaḥ sa śarīrasya eva
sa śarīrasya eva sa manaska tvāt iti ced na
manasaḥ nitya tvena deha apagame pi manasaḥ sadbhāvena anaikāntyāt
atas vicitra avayava sanniveśa viśeṣa tanu bhuvana ādi kārya nirmāṇe puṇya pāpa paravaśaḥ parimita śakti jñānaḥ
kṣetrajñaḥ na prabhavati iti cintya aparimita jñāna śakti aiśvaryo
śarīraḥ saṃkalpa mātra sādhana pariniṣpanna ananta vistāra vicitra racana prapañcaḥ puruṣa viśeṣa
īśvaraḥ numānena eva siddhi ati

original: ataḥ pramāṇāntarāvaseyatvād brahmaṇo naitadvākyaṃ brahma pratipādayati /
analyzed: atas pramāṇa antara avaseya tvāt brahmaṇaḥ na etat vākyam brahma pratipādayati

original: kiṃ ca, atyantabhinnayor eva mṛddravyakulālayor nimittopādānatvadarśanena ākāśāder
analyzed: kim ca atyanta bhinnayoḥ eva mṛd dravya kulālayoḥ nimitta upādāna tva darśanena ākāśa ādeḥ

original: niravayavadravyasya kāryatvānupapattyā ca naikam eva brahma kṛtsnasya jagato nimittam
analyzed: niravayava dravyasya kārya tva anupapattyā ca nā ekam eva brahma kṛtsnasya jagataḥ nimittam
upādānam ca pratipādayitum śaknoti iti

original: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma janmādivākyaṃ bodhayaty eva /
analyzed: evam prāpte brūmaḥ yathā ukta lakṣaṇam brahma janma ādi vākyam bodhayati eva
kutas śāstra eka pramāṇaka tvāt brahmaṇaḥ

original: yad uktaṃ sāvayavatvādinā kāryaṃ sarvaṃ jagat,
analyzed: yat uktam sāvayava tva ādinā kāryam sarvam jagat

original: kāryaṃ ca taducitakartṛviśeṣapūrvakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti nikhilajagannirmāṇatadupādānopakaraṇavedanacaturaḥ kaścid anumeya iti;
analyzed: kāryam ca tad ucita kartṛ viśeṣa pūrvakam dṛṣṭam iti nikhila jagat nirmāṇa tad upādāna upakaraṇa vedana caturaḥ kaścid anumeyaḥ iti
tat ayuktam

original: mahīmahārṇavādīnāṃ kāryatve 'pi ekadaivaikenaiva nirmitā ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: mahī mahā arṇava ādīnām kārya tve pi ekadā evā ekena eva nirmitāḥ iti atra pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: na caikasya ghaṭasyeva sarveṣām ekaṃ kāryatvam,
analyzed: na ca ekasya ghaṭasya iva sarveṣām ekam kārya tvam
yena ekadā ekaḥ kartā syāt
pṛthak bhūteṣu kāryeṣu kāla bheda kartṛ bheda darśanena kartṛ kāla āikya niyama adarśanāt

original: na ca kṣetrajñānāṃ vicitrajagannirmāṇaśaktyā kāryatvabalena tadatiriktakalpanāyām anekakalpanānupapatteś ca ekaḥ kartā bhavitum arhatīti;
analyzed: na ca kṣetrajñānām vicitra jagat nirmāṇa śaktyā kāryatva balena tad atirikta kalpanāyām aneka kalpanā anupapatteḥ ca ekaḥ kartā bhavitum arhati iti
kṣetrajñānām eva upacita puṇya viśeṣāṇām śakti vaicitrya darśanena
teṣām eva atiśayita adṛṣṭa saṃbhāvanayā ca tad tad vilakṣaṇa kārya hetu tva saṃbhavāt
tad atirikta atyanta adṛṣṭa puruṣa kalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: na ca yugapat sarvotpattis sarvocchittiś ca pramāṇapadavīm adhirohataḥ; adarśanāt,
analyzed: na ca yugapad sarva utpattiḥ sarva ucchittiḥ ca pramāṇa padavīm adhirohataḥ adarśanāt
krameṇa eva utpatti vināśa darśanāt ca

original: kāryatvena sarvotpattivināśayoḥ kalpyamānayoḥ darśanānuguṇyena kalpanāyāṃ virodhābhāvāc ca /
analyzed: kārya tvena sarva utpatti vināśayoḥ kalpyamānayoḥ darśana ānuguṇyena kalpanāyām virodha abhāvāt ca
atas buddhimat eka kartṛkatve sādhye kāryatvasya anaikāntyam
pakṣasya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam
sādhya vikala tā ca dṛṣṭāntasya
sarva nirmāṇa caturasya ekasya aprasiddheḥ
buddhimat kartṛka tva mātre sādhye siddhasādhana tā

original: sārvajñyasarvaśaktiyuktasya kasyacid ekasya sādhakam idaṃ kāryatvaṃ kiṃ yugamadutpadyamānasarvavastugatam ?
analyzed: sārvajñya sarva śakti yuktasya kasyacid ekasya sādhakam idam kārya tvam kim yugamat utpadyamāna sarva vastu gatam
uta krameṇa utpadyamāna sarva vāstu gatam
yugapad utpadyamāna sarva vastu gata tve kāryatvasya asiddha tā
aneka karṭrka tva sādhanāt viruddha tā
atra api eka karṭrka tva sādhane pratyakṣa anumāna virodhaḥ śāstra virodhaḥ ca
kumbhakāraḥ jāyate
rathakāraḥ jāyate ityādi śravaṇāt

original: api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ śarīrādīnāṃ ca sattvādiguṇakāryarūpasukhādyanvayadarśanena sattvādimūlatvam avaśyāśrayaṇīyam /
analyzed: api ca sarveṣām kāryāṇām śarīra ādīnām ca sattva ādi guṇa kārya rūpa sukha ādi anvaya darśanena sattva ādi mūla tvam avaśya āśrayaṇīyam
kārya vaicitrya hetu bhūtāḥ kāraṇa gatāḥ viśeṣāḥ sattva ādayaḥ
teṣām kāryāṇām tad mūla tva āpādanam tad yukta puruṣa antaḥkaraṇa vikāra dvāreṇa

original: puruṣasya ca tadyogaḥ karmamūlaḥ iti kāryaviśeṣārambhāyaiva jñānaśaktivat kartuḥ karmasaṃbandhaḥ kāryahetutvenaivāvaśyāśrayanīyaḥ;
analyzed: puruṣasya ca tad yogaḥ karma mūlaḥ iti kārya viśeṣa ārambhāya eva jñānaśakti vat kartuḥ karma saṃbandhaḥ kārya hetu tvena eva avaśya āśrayanīyaḥ
jñānaśakti vaicitryasya ca karma mūla tvāt

original: icchāyāḥ kāryārambhahetutve 'pi viṣayaviśeṣaviśeṣitāyās tasyās sattvāimūlakatvena karmasaṃbandho 'varjanīyaḥ / ataḥ
analyzed: icchāyāḥ kārya ārambha hetu tve pi viṣaya viśeṣa viśeṣitāyāḥ tasyāḥ sattva aimūlaka tvena karma saṃbandhaḥ varjanīyaḥ atas
kṣetrajñāḥ eva kartāraḥ
na tad vilakṣaṇaḥ kaścid anumānāt sidhyati
bhavanti ca prayogāḥ tanu bhuvana ādi kṣetrajña kartṛkam
kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat
īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati
prayojana śūnya tvāt
mukta ātma vat
īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati
aśarīra tvāt tadvat eva
na ca kṣetrajñānām sva śarīra adhiṣṭhāne vyabhicāraḥ
tatra api anādeḥ sadbhāvāt
vimati viṣayaḥ kālaḥ na loka śūnyaḥ
kāla tvāt
vartamāna kāla vat iti

original: api ca, kim īśvaras saśarīro 'śarīro vā kāryaṃ karoti ?
analyzed: api ca kim īśvaraḥ sa śarīraḥ śarīraḥ vā kāryam karoti
na tāvat aśarīraḥ
aśarīrasya kartṛ tva anupalabdheḥ
mānasāni api kāryāṇi sa śarīrasya eva bhavanti
manasaḥ nitya tve pi aśarīreṣu mukteṣu tad kārya adarśanāt
na api sa śarīraḥ
vikalpa asaha tvāt tat śarīram kim nityam uta anityam
na tāvat nityam

original: sāvayavasya tasya nityatve jagato 'pi nityatvāvirodhād īśvarāsiddheḥ /
analyzed: sāvayavasya tasya nitya tve jagataḥ api nitya tva avirodhāt īśvara asiddheḥ
na api anityam
tad vyatiriktasya tad śarīra hetoḥ tadānīm abhāvāt

original: svayam eva hetur iti cen na;
analyzed: svayam eva hetuḥ iti ced na
aśarīrasya tad ayogāt

original: anyena śarīreṇa saśarīra iti cen na;
analyzed: anyena śarīreṇa sa śarīraḥ iti ced na
anavasthānāt
sa kim sa vyāpāraḥ nirvyāpāraḥ vā
aśarīra tvāt eva na sa vyāpāraḥ
nā api nirvyāpāraḥ kāryam karoti mukta ātma vat

original: kāryaṃ jagad icchāmātravyāpārakartṛkam ity ucyamāne pakṣasyāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvam,
analyzed: kāryam jagat icchā mātra vyāpāra kartṛkam iti ucyamāne pakṣasya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam
dṛṣṭāntasya ca sādhya hīna tā

original: ato darśanānuguṇyeneśvarānumānaṃ darśanānuguṇyaparāhatam iti śāstraikapramāṇakaḥ parabrahmabhūtas sarveśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
analyzed: atas darśana ānuguṇyena īśvara anumānam darśana ānuguṇya parāhatam iti śāstra eka pramāṇakaḥ para brahma bhūtaḥ sarva īśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ
śāstram tu sakala itara pramāṇa paridṛṣṭa samasta vastu visajātīyam sārvajñya satya saṃkalpa tva ādi miśra anavadhika atiśaya aparimita udāra guṇa sāgaram
nikhila heya pratyanīka svarūpam pratipādayati iti na pramāṇa antara avasita vastu sādharmya prayukta doṣa gandha prasaṅgaḥ

original: yat tu nimittopādānayor aikyam ākāśāder niravayavadravyasya kāryatvaṃ cānupalabdham aśakyapratipādanam ity uktam,
analyzed: yat tu nimitta upādānayoḥ aikyam ākāśa ādeḥ niravayava dravyasya kārya tvam ca anupalabdham aśakya pratipādanam iti uktam

original: tad apy aviruddham iti prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt,
analyzed: tat api aviruddham iti prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt
na viyat aśruteḥ iti atra pratipādayiṣyate

original: ataḥ pramāṇāntarāgocaratvena śāstraikaviṣayatvād yato vā imāni bhūtānīti vākyam uktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipādayatīti siddham //1,1.3//
analyzed: atas pramāṇa antara agocara tvena śāstra eka viṣaya tvāt yatas vā imāni bhūtāni iti vākyam ukta lakṣaṇam brahma pratipādayati iti siddham
